200.description: Obtener el ResultData con la informacion del productOrder rellena

id.description: Unique identifier of the product order

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product order

category.description: Category of the product order, for example, Residential, Business, Bulk, and so on

subCategory.description: Sub category of the product order, for example, PreActivation, Suspend, and so on

state.description: State of the product order, for example, Acknowledged, Rejected, Pending, and so on

externalId.description: External ID of the product order. This parameter is usually provided by a consumer to identify the product order in the consumer system.

orderDate.description: Date on which the product order was created

lastUpdate.description: Date on which the product order was last updated

completionDate.description: Date on which the product order was completed

requestedStartDate.description: Date on which the product order was requested to be started

requestedCompletionDate.description: Date on which the product order was requested to be completed

expectedCompletionDate.description: Date on which the product order is expected to be completed

orderPriceDate.description: Date on which the product order price was calculated

isCustomerVisible.description: Indicates whether the product order is visible to the customer

relatedParty.description: Party associated with the product order

orderItem.description: Active order item of the product order

orderTotalPrice.description: Total price of the product order

payment.description: Payment performed for the entire order or for an order item

immediatePromotion.x-dox-DesignNote: Reference to the Immediate Promotions with details

externalIdentifier.description: List of external identifiers related to the product order

orderRelationship.description: Relation to other product order resources

note.description: Extra information about the product order

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing account

href.description: Hypertext reference to the billing account

@referredType.description: Name of the type of the referred resource entity

OrderItem.description: An identified part of the product order. A product order is decomposed into one or more order items.

id.description: Unique identifier of the order item

action.description: Action applied to the order item (for example - add, suspend, resume, terminate, and so on). If there are multiple actions, a semicolon (;) is used as the delimiter.

quantity.description: Quantity of the order item. This property is relevant only for the top-most non-serialized order items.

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the order item can be reconfigured

completionDate.description: Date on which the order item was completed

requestedStartDate.description: Date on which the order item was requested to be started

requestedCompletionDate.description: Date on which the order item was requested to be completed

expectedCompletionDate.description: Date on which the order item is expected to be completed

retroactiveChangeDate.description: Past date of a retroactive change performed on the order item

itemTotalPrice.description: Total price of the order item

relatedImmediatePromotion.description: List of immediate promotions related to the order item

externalIdentifier.description: List of external identifiers related to the order item

note.description: Extra information about the order item

OrderPrice.description: An amount, usually of money, that represents the actual price paid by the customer for the order item or the product order in CatalogONE

id.description: Unique identifier of the catalog price

name.description: Name of the catalog price, for example, Subscription Price

description.description: Detailed description of the catalog price of the entity (the product order or the order item)

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measurement of the catalog price. This property is populated if the price type is allowance, such as gigabytes, minutes, and so on.

recurringChargePeriod.description: Period for which to repeat the application of the recurring charge - days, weeks, months, or years. This property is populated only if the price type is Recurring.

recurringChargePeriodLength.description: The period length of the recurring charge

priceType.description: Category of the catalog price, for example, allowance, recurring, and so on

taxIncluded.description: Indicates whether the price is defined in CatalogONE as including tax or excluding tax. Valid values are Excluded and Included.

role.description: The role of the price, for example, price, bundle price alteration, and so on

Price.description:
The price of current catalog item. It is set to null if the price record is
missing or if there is any exception.

priceRecordId.description: The unique identifier of the price in the pricing domain.

impactingPriceParameter.description: The parameters that impact the price

PriceParam.description: The parameters that may impact/impact the price

type.description: The type of the parameter

name.description: The display name of tax type

isExemption.description: Where the tax definition has exemption defined on it

exemptionType.description: Exemption type. Valid Values - Customer, Service, Jurisdiction, None.

PriceAlteration.description: An amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an  item

name.description: Name of the price, for example, Subscription Price

description.description: Detailed description of the price of the entity

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measurement of the price. This property is populated if the price type is allowance, such as gigabytes, minutes, and so on.

recurringChargePeriod.description: Recurring charge period. This property is populated if the price type is Recurring.

recurringChargePeriodLength.description: The period length of the recurring charge

priceType.description: Category of the price, for example, allowance, recurring, and so on

promotionActionId.description: Unique identifier of the promotion action triggering this price alteration

immediatePromotionId.description: Unique identifier of the promotion instance

alterationProductOfferingPriceId.description: Unique identifier of the product offering price on behalf of which the price alteration was given

alterationBundleProductOfferingId.description: Unique identifier of the bundle product offering on behalf of which the price alteration was given

alterationApplyOrder.description: Order of the alteration price appliance

chargeType.description:
Charge type represented by the price alteration. The supported values are:
  • debit
  • discount
  • credit

ImmediatePayOption.description:
The payment options for the product offering price payment. The payment options can indicate whether the price must or might be paid immediatelly.
In addition, the payment options include an indication whether the price should be included in the immediate payment or not.
If the payment option is set to must, this indication is set to true. Otherwise, if the payment option is set to might, the indication is set to either
true or false based on a customer decission.

payOption.description:
The immediate pay option:
  • *MUST* - The price must be paid immediately
  • *MAY* - The price might be paid immediately

payImmediately.description:
Indicates whether the prcie included in the immediate payment.
If the pay option is set to MUST, this indication is set to true.
If the pay option is set to MAY, this indication is set to either true or false based on a customer decission.

InstallmentOption.description: Represents an installment option for an  price

id.description: The identifier of the installment option

installmentOption.description: Indicates if installment options are optional / mandatory for the price

percentage.description: Represents the percentage that the amount represents out of the price

ModifyReason.description: Modification reason associated with the action performed on the product offering that is related to the order item

reasonText.description: Text of the modification reason. This property is populated if the type of the modification reason requires an input of a free text.

action.description: Action performed on the instance of the product offering

DurationPolicy.description: Policy for calculting a limited duration for any entity

startDatePolicy.description: Start date of the policy, from which the duration is calculated

endDatePolicy.description: End date of the policy, until which the duration is calculated

terminationPolicy.description: Defines the termination policy upon duration end date

units.description: Units that are associated with the quantity

amount.description: Amount that is associated with the quantity

id.description: Unique identifier of the referenced order item

type.description: Type of the relationship to the related order item

externalId.description:
External ID of the referenced order item.
This value is used if the referenced order item is not persisted yet (that is, no ID was assigned for it). The *id* attribute, if set, takes precedence over the external ID.

ProductOfferingRef.description: Reference to the product offering entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog. The resource includes pricing information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product offering

@referredType.description: Name of the type of the referred resource entity

productOfferingTypeGroup.description: The type of the product offering group

productOfferingClassification.description: The classification of the product offering. Valid values: customerOffer, subscriberMainOffer, subscriberOffer

serialized.description: Indicates whether the product offering is maintained per instance or can represent a bulk quantity

valueRank.description: Value rank of the product offering

id.description: Unique Identifier of the attachment

href.description: Hypertext reference to the individual.

type.description: Identifies the type of the attachment - identity, invoice, quote etc.

sizeUnit.description: Unit of measure for size ( bytes, kiloBytes etc.)

url.description: URL/location of the attachment in underlying document management system.

EntityRef.description: Describes a reference to an entity to which the attachment is associated

id.description: Unique identifier of the related entity

href.description: Hypertext reference to the related entity

referredType.description: Type of the related entity (e.g. individual, bill, product, account etc.). Always in lower case.

Product.description: An owned product or a product to be provided

id.description: Unique identifier of the product

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product

status.description: State of the product in the Product Inventory subdomain

version.description: Version of the product in the Product Inventory subdomain

primaryProductId.description: Unique identifier of the primary product. This property is populated only when the product is a product reference for the *Enable By* relation, and the referenced product is a product in the inventory and is not part of the order. In this case, the property contains the ID of the product ancestor that is marked as primary. This property and *productOrderRef* are mutually exclusive.

activationDate.description: Date on which the product was activated

terminationDate.description: Date on which the product is terminated

ProductSpecificationRef.description: Detailed information of a tangible or intangible object that is made available externally in the form of a product offering to customers or other parties playing a party role

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product specification

ProductCharacteristic.description: Characteristics of the product to instantiate or to modify

valueType.description: Value type of the product characteristic

valueMetadata.description: Metadata of the product characteristic value

type.description: Type of the relationship

subtype.description: Specific relation entity subtype. Relevant for several relation types

id.description: Unique identifier of the product order

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product order

orderItemId.description: The ID of the order item

Validation.description: Validation result that is associated with the product order

ValidationMessage.description: Message associated with the validation failure

id.description: Non-localized name identifier of the validation message

type.description: Type of the validation message

subtype.description: Distinct code which represents the issue

parameter.description: Name/value pair of the validation message

path.description: Path to the resource part to which the validation message is related

resource.description: Resource that is associated with the message

ValidationMessageParameter.description: Name/value pair of the validation message parameter

RelatedResource.description: Resource that is associated with the validation message (that is, triggered the validation failure)

type.description: Type of the resource

id.description: Unique identifier of the resource

containedResource.description: Other resources, specs, or offers that are linked to the message but did not trigger the validation message

Variable.description: Variable that is associated with a resource

type.description: Type of the variable

id.description: Unique identifier of the variable

ContainedResource.description: Resources that are contained in the validation message

type.description: Type of the resource

id.description: Unique identifier of the resource

variable.description: Variables that are related to the resource

ConfigurationChange.description: Configuration change recommended for a validated resource

id.description: Unique identifier of the configuration change
id.x-dox-DesignNote: A unique identifier of the validation rule or its message.

type.description: Implementation discriminator of the configuration change

path.description: Path to the configuration change in the resource model

skipRevalidation.description: Indicates whether revalidation of the configuration change is required

configurationChangeSource.description:
Holds a list of the impacting components that are involved in action rule
- enablmentRelation - The action rule has impacting enablment relation functionality or was created by this functionality.
- commertialRelation - The action rule has impacting commertial relation functionality or was created by this functionality.
- subscriptionRelation - The action rule has impacting subscription relation or was created by this functionality. functionality
- catalog - The action rule was created by catalog.

ConfigurationChangeParameter.description: Name/value pair of the configuration change parameters

valueType.description:
Types of each Value in the parameter array
As a default - when empty - the type is string.
Also will be supported-
** HashMap - a jason format representation of key value <string,string> map.

op.description: Operation that is associated with the patched resource part. Valid values are *add*, *remove*, or *replace*.

path.description: Path of this resource part within the patched resource, for example, */note*, */name*, or */orderItem/quantity*

value.description: Value of the patched resource part

AppointmentRef.description: Reference to the appointment information that is captured if a product order item requires an appointment between the service provider and the customer.

id.description: Unique identifier of the appointment

href.description: Hypertext reference to the appointment

@referredType.description: Name of the type of the referred resource entity

ProductOfferingGroupOption.description: Reference to the product offering group option from the product catalog

groupOptionId.description: Unique identifier of the product offering group option in the product catalog

OrderTerm.description: Commitment with duration. Either a duration or a name must be provided.

name.description: Name of the product order commitment term

description.description: Description of the product order commitment term

freezeDate.description: Date on which the commitment was frozen due to an action performed on the product

impactType.description: Type of the impact on the term of the order item due to an action performed on the product

policyId.description: Unique identifier of the order item term policy

metadata.description: Metadata of the product order commitment term

OrderTerm.x-dox-DesignNote: In practice it stands for Commitment Term (in the future other types of terms may be supported)

PaymentRef.description: Reference to the immediate payment information that is captured for the product order if such payment was performed at the product order submission

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment

href.description: Hypertext reference to the payment

@referredType.description: Name of the type of the referred resource entity

RelatedImmediatePromotion.description: Reference to the full immediate promotion

id.description: Unique identifier of the immediate promotion

itemQualificationType.description: Type of the qualification result for an item - *trigger* or *benefit*

itemStatus.description:
Status of the item in the promotion:
- *add* - A new item in the product promotion
- *keep* - An existing item that remains as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion
- *revoke* - An existing item that is revoked as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion

StockItem.description: Stock information of the product in the stock management system

stockAvailabilityStatus.description: Stock availability levels for the product - *inStock*, *outOfStock*, *lowStock*, and *unavailable*

stockAvailabilityQuantity.description: Actual number of items in stock for this product

id.description: Unique identifier of the stock reservation

Note.description: Extra information about a given entity

id.description: Identifier of the note
Unique identifier of the channel

href.description: Hypertext reference to the channel

role.description: Role of the channel, for example, *initChannel*

id.description: Unique identifier of the immediate promotion

status.description: Status of the instance of the immediate promotion

state.description:
The apply state of the qualified promotion. The state can have the following values:
- 'applied' - For an immediate promotion that all of it's benefits are applied
- 'notApplied' - For an immediate promotion that none of it's benefits are applied - future
- 'partiallyApplied' - For an immediate promotion that part of it's benefits are applied - future
- 'pendingApply' - Received in the request for an immediate promotion for which certain benefits, which are selected externally by a consuming application, should be applied

triggerItem.x-dox-DesignNote: A reference to the TriggerItem  definition.

benefitItem.x-dox-DesignNote: A reference to the Benefit definition.

id.description: Unique identifier of the promotion

description.description: Promotion description for a business user

type.description: The type of the promotion

applyPolicy.description: Defines the policy to apply the promotion - can be manual or automatic

href.description: Hypertext reference to the promotion

PromotionRef.x-dox-DesignNote: Promotion description for a business user

id.description: Unique identifier of the product promotion

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product promotion

ProductPromotionRef.x-dox-DesignNote: Product Promotion description for Business user

TriggerItem.description: Item that participated in the promotion qualification

id.description: Unique identifier of the trigger item

href.description: Hypertext reference to the trigger item

promotionCriteriaGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the promotion criteria group (root or nested) as part of which this item is qualified as trigger item

itemStatus.description:
Status of the trigger item in the promotion:
- *add* - A new trigger item in the product promotion
- *keep* - An existing trigger item that remains as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion
- *revoke* - An existing trigger item that is revoked as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion

pathToRoot.description: Path from the current item in the product offering structure to the root. Populated if the trigger item is a nested item.

ContextCharacteristic.description: The list of dynamic characteristics related to a specific context

contextType.description: The context type of the characteristic

valueType.description: The value type of the characteristic

BenefitItem.description: Item that received the promotion benefit, which is a benefit granted through the promotion - can be discount, allowance, free services

id.description: Unique identifier of the benefit item

href.description: Hypertext reference to the benefit item

promotionCriteriaGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the promotion criteria group (root or nested) as part of which this item is qualified as a benefit item

itemStatus.description:
Status of the benefit item in the promotion:
- *add* - A new benefit item in the product promotion
- *keep* - An existing benefit item that remains as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion
- *revoke* - An existing benefit item that is revoked as the result of reevaluation in the product promotion

itemState.description:
The apply state of the benefit on a benefit item. The state can have the following values:
- 'applied' - For a benefit that is applied
- 'notApplied' - For a benefit that is not applied
- 'pendingApply' - Received in the request for a benefit, for which the relevant benefit item is selected and should be applied

pathToRoot.description: Path from the current item in the product offering structure to the root. Populated if the benefit item is a nested item.

action.x-dox-DesignNote: A reference to the Benefit definition.

PromotionAction.description: Action of the promotion. Customers can receive benefits associated with the action if the conditions in the promotion pattern are fulfilled.

id.description: Unique identifier of the promotion action

actionType.description: Type of the action. A valid value is *Price Alteration*, *Product Offering*.

actionValue.description: Value of the action. If the *actionType* is Price Alteration, the action value is '1'.

productOfferingBenefit.description: Reference to a product offering usaed as a free offer benefit by the promotion

actionTerminationPolicy.description: Defines the termination policy upon duration end date

ProductOfferingPriceRef.description: Reference to the action discount. Represents a pricing entity that defines the actual discount for the product offering.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering price

ProductOfferingBenefit.description: Reference to a product offering used as a free offer benefit by the promotion

productOfferingId.description: the id of the product offering granted as a benefit

promotionPriceAlteration.description: referecne to price entity representing the actual monetary discount

id.description: Unique identifier of the product order

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product order

type.description: Relation type

Error.description: Error response. This object is used when an API throws an error, typically with a HTTP error response codes 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx

code.description: Error code relevant to an application, defined in the API or in a common list

reason.description: Explanation of the reason for the error that can be displayed to a user

message.description: Additional information about the error  and corrective actions related to the error that can be displayed to a user

referenceError.description: URI of the documentation describing the error

traceId.description: Unique tracker ID that is used to facilitate the troubleshooting

characteristic.description: Charachteristic parameters that are associated with the error

ErrorCharacteristic.description: Parameter that is associated with the error entity

name.description: Non-localized name identifier of the characteristic

ValidationError.description: Validation error object that is used when an API throws an error, typically with a HTTP error response code 422

ProductOrderBillingAccountRelation.description: Association of the product order to a billing account

action.description: The requested action (add/replace/remove) of the billing account entity

orderItem.description: Order item that is related to the billing account or holds the price of the product order associated with the billing account

OrderItemBillingAccountRelation.description: Order item that is related to the billing account or holds the price of the product order associated with the billing account

id.description: Unique identifier of the order item

action.description: Requested action (add/replace/remove) of the billing account entity

itemPrice.description: Price that is assigned to the relation of the billing account to the product order

OrderPriceBillingAccountRelation.description: Price that is assigned to the relation of the billing account to the product order

id.description: Unique identifier of the price

action.description: Requested action (add/replace/remove) of the billing account entity

ProductRef.description: Reference to an owned product or to a product to be provided

id.description: Unique identifier of the product

status.description: State of the product in the Product Inventory subdomain

isPortIn.description: Indicates whether the number is ported in

phoneNumber.description: Phone number that is used if this property is populated. If the number is ported in, this property can include the temporary number, or the number that is used permanently.

portedNumber.description: Number to which the customer wishes to port in

DeliveryMethodProductOrder.description: Product order for the delivery method

id.description: Unique identifier of the product order

deliveryMethodOrderItem.description: List of the active order items in the product order

DeliveryMethodOrderItem.description: Order item that contains the delivery method

id.description: Unique identifier of the order item

action.description: Action performed on the order item: add, replace, or remove

deliveringOrderItem.description: List of order items that must have the delivery method

note.description: Extra information about the product order

DeliveringOrderItem.description: Order item that requires a delivery and is related to the *deliveryMethodOrderItem*

id.description: Unique identifier of the order item

action.description: Action performed on the order item - add, replace, or remove

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

href.description: Hypertext reference to the product offering

type.description: Type of the product offering

productOfferingCharacteristic.description: List of characteristics for the product offering. The type of the characteristic is determined by the related characteristic property entity.

orderItem.description: Order items that can be used by the product offerings

appointmentRequired.description: Is appointment required for this product offering

DeliveryProductOfferingCharacteristic.description: List of descriptive characteristics for the Discovery flows derived from the product offering and the included product specification (if exists)

name.description: Text identifier of the product offering characteristic

productSpecification.description:
Reference to the product specification catalog entity under which the product offering characteristic is defined.
The product specification reference exists only for characteristics that are related to the product offering via a product specification.
Thus, the product specification reference can be used for grouping the product offering characteristics under a shared product specification identifier (or none).

DeliveryProductOfferingCharacteristicVal.description: Available values of the descriptive characteristic

valueFrom.description: Lower limit of the characteristic value. This property is applicable only when a range filter is used.

valueTo.description: Upper limit of the characteristic value. This property is applicable only when a range filter is used.

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measurement of the characteristic value of the product offering

default.description:
Indicates whether the product offering characteristic value is the default value as defined in the product offering catalog configuration.
Only one value can be selected as a default. In the case of a range filter, the selected range is the default.

ProductOrderOrderItemRef.description: Reference to the order item related to the product order

id.description: Unique identifier of the containing product order

href.description: Hypertext reference to the containing product order

orderItemId.description: Unique identifier of the product order item (optional)

orderItemAction.description: Action that is related to the product order item (optional)

id.description: The unique identifier of customer

href.description: Hypertext reference to the customer

statusReason.description: The text descriing the reason for status change

characteristic.description: Describes the characteristics of customer such as customer hobbies,center of interest etc. Apart from storage and retrieval no operations such as filtering,sorting etc. will be supported on these v  alues.

relatedParty.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference. A new party can be added or can be removed.

account.description: A account may be a party account or an account receivable.

paymentMethod.description: A payment method defines a specific mean of payment (e.g direct debit).

creditProfile.description: Credit profile for the party (containing credit scoring etc.). By default only the current credit profile is retrieved. It can be used as a list to give the party credit profiles history, the first one in the list will be the current one

contactMedium.description: Describes the contact medium characteristics that could be used to contact a Customer

PartyRefOrValue.description: This is base type which can represent either a reference (e.g. PartyRef) or a party value (e.g.IndividualValue). The exact type can be deduced  using type and refType attribute.

type.description: Type of the entity PartyRef/Organization/Individual in instance.

refType.description: Describes type of PartyRef. For example if type=PartyRef and refType=Individual then it means its a PartyRefOrValue instance is representing reference to Individual. This attribute is useful on cosumer side to deduce the type of PartyReference.

id.description:
Unique identifier of an existing party.
Patchable - No

href.description:
Hypertext reference to the existing related party.
Patchable - No

PartyRef.description: This represents  a reference to Engaged party.

AccountRefOrValue.description: An account may be a party account or an account receivable.

id.description: The unique identifier of an existing account.

href.description: The hypertext reference to the related account.

type.description: The type of resource - e.g. AccountRef/FinancialAccountValue/BillingAccountValue

preferred.description:
Indicates if this is preferred account. Preferred account are used to for default processing. 
This can be used for default logic.

refType.description: Describes type of AccountRef. For example if type=AccountRef and refType=FinancialAccount then it means its a PartyRefOrValue instance is representing reference to Financial acount. This attribute is useful on cosumer side to deduce the type of PartyReference.

CreditProfile.description: Credit profile for the party (containing credit scoring, ...). By default only the current credit profile is retrieved. It can be used as a list to give the party credit profiles history, the first one in the list will be the current one.

id.description:
The unique identifier of an credit profile.
Patchable - No

creditProfileDate.description: The date on which profile was established/created.

creditRiskRating.description: This is an integer whose value is used to rate the risk.

creditScore.description:
A measure of a person's or an organization's creditworthiness
calculated on the basis of a combination of factors such as their income and
credit history.

BillingAccountValue.description: Billing Account as Value. This would be useful when user wants to send specific values for FA creation.

givenName.description: The first name of the individual

middleName.description: The middle name of the individual

familyName.description: The family name of the individual

formattedName.description: The formatted name useful for specific contexts (Chinese,Japanese,Korean)

fullName.description: The full name flatten (first,middle and last name flatten)

birthDate.description: The date of birth of individual

deathDate.description: The date of death of individual

location.description: The temporary current location of the individual (may be used if the individual has approved its sharing).

maritalStatus.description: The marital status of the individual ( Married,divorced etc.)

placeOfBirth.description: The place of the birth of the individual.

status.description: The status of the individual (active/inactive/obsolete etc.)

residencyType.description: The type of residency such as Rent,Own

language.description: The primary language of the individual.

personRank.description: The degree of importance of the person to the service provider.

profileImageURL.description: The published url for profile picture of Individual

identification.description: Represents information used as proof of identity by an individual (Passport/national identity card/SSN etc.)

Characteristics.description: Describes the characteristics of individual such as individual hobbies,center of interest etc

PlaceRef.description: Places where the products are sold or delivered

id.description: Unique identifier of the place

href.description: Hypertext reference to the place

name.description: User-friendly name for the place, such as Paris Store, Main Home, and so on

@referredType.description: Name of the type of the referred resource entity

SubPlaceRef.description: A subplace reference is a pointer to either GeographicSubAddress

id.description: Unique identifier of GeographicSubAddress

@referredType.description: Describes the type of entity such as GeographicAddress,GeographicSubAddress or GeographicLocation

PaymentMethodRef.description: A payment method defines a specific mean of payment (e.g. direct debit/credit card)

id.description:
Unique id of an existing Payment Method.
Patchable - No

href.description: Hypertext reference to the existing related Payment Method.

name.description: The name of related Payment Method.

type.description: Describes the type of Payment method like Credit Card, BankAccount etc.

preferred.description: If the method is the preferred one by the owner. Typically used when querying for the payment methods of a specific customer or account.

ContactMedium.description: Contact medium associated to the customer (e.g. email address, telephone number etc).

id.description: Unique , auto-generated identifier

type.description: Contact medium type like email address, telephone number, postal address.

preferred.description: Indicator for preferred contact medium for communication

MediumCharacteristic.description: Medium information for customer(e.g. email address, mobile number,fax number).

type.description: Type of medium (fax, mobile phone...).

emailAddress.description: The contact's email address for the ContactMedium type of email.

number.description: The contact's phone number for Contact Medium type telephone number.

city.description: The city name for the contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

country.description: The country ISO code for the contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

postCode.description: The postcode for the contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

stateOrProvince.description: The state or province from contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

street1.description: The first street line for the contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

street2.description: The second street line for the contact's address for Contact Medium type postal address.

ExternalReference.description: To manage touch points external OTT identifiers for person (facebook,google+ etc.)

type.description: The name of the external system or social channel. eg. facebook, twitter, etc.

href.description: Hypertext reference to the user image

id.description: Unique identifier of external reference

avatar.description: The URL of the social user image

socialName.description: The displayable name of the social channel account

socialId.description: The internal identifier from the social channel account

status.description: Status of social profile such as pending, verified, obsolete and so on

userName.description: The login name of the social channel account

InfluenceScore.description: Represents a social influence score of an individual

provider.description: Name of the social analytics score provider; e.g. Klout

score.description: Score of an individual as calculated by the provider

OtherName.description: To keep track of other names for e.g old name of a woman before marriage , an artist name etc.

id.description: Unique identifier , auto-generated

title.description: Used for title like Pr,Dr,Sir etc

fullName.description: Full Name flatten (first,middle and last name flatten)

formattedName.description: A formatted name useful for specific contexts (Chinese,Japanese,Korean)

IndividualIdentification.description: Represents our registration of information used as proof of identity by an individual (Passport/national identity card/SSN etc.).The uniqueness of Individual is decided based on identificationId and type.

id.description: Unique identifier of the indentification

identificationId.description: Identification value like actual SSN , passport number and so on.

issuingAuthority.description: Issuing authority like state, federal etc.

type.description: Type of identification like SSN,Passport etc.

primary.description: Indicates whether this identification is primary among several ones

attachment.description: Manages attachments of an individual identification

id.description: Unique identifier of the disability

additionalAttribute.description: Describes the expression evaluation  of individual such as individual name,hasPhone No etc.

AttachmentRef.description: Represents a reference to the associated attachment

id.description: Unique, auto-generated identifier of the associated attachment

href.description: The HREF of the attachmetn

name.description: The name of the attachment. Optional.

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of the period

endDateTime.description: End date and time of the period

status.description: Valid values are 'In Progress', 'Terminated With Error', 'Done'

GeographicAddress.description: A geographic address is a structured, textual way of describing how to find a Property in an urban area.

id.description: Unique identifier of the geographic address

href.description: URI to access the geographic address resource

streetNr.description: The number identifying a specific property on a public street. It may be combined with streetNrLast for ranged addresses.

streetNrLast.description: The last number in a range of street numbers allocated to a property.

streetNrLastSuffix.description: The last street number suffix for a ranged address.

streetName.description: The name of the street or other street type.

streetType.description: The type of street. Alley, avenue, boulevard, brae, crescent, drive, highway, lane, terrace, parade, place, tarn, way, or wharf

streetSuffix.description: A modifier denoting a particular direction.

displayText.description: The display text for the address. For example in case of @type=Country the displayText would contain long displayble string.

postcode.description: The descriptor of postal delivery area, used to speed & simplify delivery of mail (also known as zipcode).

locality.description: An area of defined or undefined boundaries within a local authority or other legislatively defined area, usually rural or semi-rural in nature'

city.description: The city that the geographic address is in.

stateOrProvince.description: The State or Province that the geographic address is in.

country.description: The country that the geographic address is in.

status.description: Status of the geographic address. Validated or Unvalidated.

@type.description: Indicates the type of the resource. Here can be 'UrbanPropertyAddress', FormattedAddress, apanesePropertyAddress , AustralianPropertyAddress, etc

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing this REST Resource.

createdOn.description: Date and time when the entity was created.

lastModifiedOn.description: Date and time when the entity was last updated.

geographicSubAddress.description: A list of geographic sub addresses (GeographicSubAddress [*])

id.description: Identifier for a GeographicSubAddress

href.description: URI to access the geographic address sub-resource

name.description: Name of geographicSubAddress to identify it with a meaningful identification

subAddressType.description: Type of sub-address. Can be sub-unit or private street

subUnitType.description: The type of subunit e.g. BERTH, FLAT, PIER, SUITE, SHOP, TOWER, UNIT, WHARF

subUnitNumber.description: The discrimator used for the subunit often just a simple number e.g. FLAT No, may also be a range.

levelType.description: This describes the level types within a building.

levelNumber.description: This is used where a level type may be repeated.

buildingName.description: This allows for buildings that have well-known names.

privateStreetNumber.description: A private street numbers internal to a private street.

privateStreetName.description: Private streets internal to a property may have internal names.

@type.description: Type of the resource for this subAdress like GeographicSubAddress

@schemaLocation.description: A Link to the schema describing this REST Resource.

status.description: Status of geographic sub address. Validated, Unvalidated

id.description: Identifier for a GeographicLocation

href.description: URI to access the geographic location

geometryType.description: Type allows describing geographic location form; it could be a point, line, polygon, etc.

ExternalIdentifier.description: Reference to an external system identifier

type.description: Type of the external system

id.description: Unique identifier in the external system

version.description: Version of the related entity in the external system

name.description: The name of the external identifier

value.description: The value of the external identifier

status.description: Valid values are 'in progress', 'terminated With Error', 'done'

@type.description: Indicates the type of the resource

@schemaLocation.description: Link to schema describing this REST resource

AddressRole.description: Represents the address roles based on context (example Individual,Customer etc).

addressRole.description: The value of the telephone medium type.

invoice.description: Indicates whether address can be used for invoice address type.

mailing.description: Indicates whether address can be used for mailing address type.

shipping.description: Indicates whether address can be used for shipping address type.

service.description: Indicates whether address can be used for service address type.

Country.description: Provides the reference data and display values for a particular country

country.description:
The code for the country used to populate the 'country' attribute in target mediums.
It will contain the ISO-3166 Alpha-3 code for the country for eg USA. 
shortLabelDisplay filed is not supported.

streetType.description: The value of the type of street.

LevelType.description: Represents the type of the level.

levelType.description: The value of the level type.

BillingAccount.description: An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. A billing account used for billing purposes. It includes a description of the bill structure, such as frequency, presentation media, format and so on.

ratingType.description: Rating Type associated with Billing Account. One of two possible value postpaid or prepaid must be filled.

PartyAccount.description: An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. PartyAccount used for billing or for settlement purposes concerning a given party (an organization or an individual).

Account.description: This is the base for all type of accounts, such as, party account, settlement account, etc. It contains a set of common attributes.

id.description: A unique identifier of the account.

href.description: A URI reference of the account.

state.description: It contains the lifecycle state, such as Active, Closed, Suspended, and so on.

createdOn.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastModified.description: The date of the last modification of the account.

type.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so on, whose instances share some of the same characteristics.

@schemaLocation.description: A uri where the data model can be retrieved.

stateDate.description: The date on which the current status becomes effective.

stateReason.description: The reason for the corresponding status, which is taken from the last activity that changed the status.

stateIssueDate.description: The date on which the status was changed.

statusLastActivity.description: The last activity that caused the status modification.

openDate.description: The date on which the account was opened.

waiveLatePaymentFee.description: Defines if a late payment fees should be calculated for this account or if the account is waived from late payment fees.

accountBalance.description: The balances linked to the account.

taxExemption.description: A proof of freedom from taxes imposed by a taxing jurisdiction.

Contact.description: It contains a reference to the related party.

id.description: Unique identifier

contactName.description: A displayable name for a contact.

contactType.description: The type of contact, primary or secondary.

partyRoleType.description: It identifies what kind of party role type is linked to the contact (account manager...).

relatedParty.description: A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

Money.description: The price and currency of the catalog item

AccountBalance.description: A proof of freedom from taxes imposed by a taxing jurisdiction.

id.description: Unique identifier

type.description: The type of the balance, deposit balance, disputed balance, loyalty balance, or receivable balance.

AccountTaxExemption.description: A proof of freedom from taxes imposed by a taxing juridiction.

id.description: Unique identifier

certificateNumber.description: An identifier of a document that shows proof of exemption from taxes for the taxing jurisdiction.

issuingJurisdiction.description: The name of the taxing jurisdiction for which taxes are exempted.

reason.description: The reason for the tax exemption.

createdBy.description: The system identification of the user that created the instance.

createdOn.description: The date and time when the instance was created.

lastModifiedBy.description: The system identification of the user who last modified the instance.

lastModifiedOn.description: The date and time when the instance was last modified.

modelVersion.description: It records the model version to allow on-the-fly upgrade of persisted data.

PaymentPlan.description: It defines a plan for payment, when a party wants to spread the payments.

numberOfPayments.description: The number of payments used to spread the global payment.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payments, such as monthly and bi-monthly.

priority.description: The priority of the payment plan.

status.description: The status of the payment plan, effective or ineffective.

type.description: Type of payment plan

FinancialAccountRef.description: It contains a reference to the financial account.

id.description: A unique identifier of an existing financial account.

href.description: A hypertext reference to the existing financial account.

name.description: The name of the financial account.

role.description: Account role (should be used to identify in which balance to add to aggregation).

BillStructure.description: The structure of the bill for the billing account.

documentType.description: It indicates whether the billing document is an invoice or a bill.

billItemTaxInd.description: It indicates whether the tax is calculated for each charge or for the total amount of the bill.

produceBillInd.description: It indicates whether a bill is produced.

zeroBalanceInd.description: It indicates whether to zero the balance of the billing account at the billing run, such as in the case of internal employees.

billFrequency.description: The bill frequency multiplier is defined in the customer's billing account. This means that different billing account for the same customer can be billed on different schedules.

dueDays.description: It defines the number of days to add to the invoice date to get the due date.

BillPresentationMediaRef.description: A means of communicating a bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, or web page.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill presentation media.

href.description: Reference of the bill presentation media.

BillFormatRef.description: A bill format is a description in the way in which a bill is presented.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill format.

href.description: Reference of the bill format.

BillingCycleSpecificationRef.description: A description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing cycle specification.

href.description: A reference of the billing cycle specification.

frequency.description: The frequency of the billing cycle, for instance, a monthly billing cycle.

billingDateShift.description: An offset of a billing or settlement date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the billing or settlement period.

externalIdentifier.description: A list of external identifiers related to the billing cycle specification.

state.description: It contains the lifecycle state, such as Active, Closed, Suspended, and so on.

count.description: It contains the count of the state.

updatebillingAccountState.description: Describes the new state for billing account

state.description: The stae of billing account to be changed to.

FinancialAccount.description: An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. A financial (account receivable account/account payable) aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts (billing or settlement) owned by a given party.

state.description: It contains the lifecycle state, such as Active, Closed, Suspended, and so on.

count.description: It contains the count of the state.

updatefinancialAccountState.description: Describes the new state for financial account

state.description: The stae of billing financial to be changed to.

financialAccountState.description: The value of the FA state.

transitionToStatus.description: The list of statuses eligible for transition.

statusChangeReason.description: The list of status change reason codes.

shortLabelDisplay.description: The displayable short text for the value of item.

fullLabelDisplay.description: The full displayable text value of the item.

selectionDisplay.description: The displayable text value for the item to be used for displaying the items on the UI.

active.description: Indicator whether the item is active or not.

default.description: Indicator whether the item is default in the list.

billingAccountState.description: The value of the state of BA.

transitionToStatus.description: The list of statuses eligible for transition.

statusChangeReason.description: The list of status change reason codes.

BillingCycleSpecification.description: A description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing cycle specification.

href.description: Reference of the billing cycle specification.

active.description: Indicator whether the item is active or not.

description.description: Explanatory text for this bill cycle specification

type.description: Reserved for describing type of entity. In this case it would be BillingCycleSpecification

frequency.description: Frequency of the billing cycle (monthly for instance).

billingDateShift.description: An offset of a billing/settlement date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the billing/settlement period.

billingPeriod.description: Billing time period. It can be recurring, for example week, month, quarter of year, year.

chargeDateOffset.description: An offset of a date through which charges previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

creditDateOffset.description: An offset of a date through which credits previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

mailingDateOffset.description: An offset of a customer bill mailing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

paymentDueDateOffset.description: An offset of a payment due date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

externalIdentifier.description: A list of external identifiers related to the billing cycle specification.

Check.description: Detailed information of check type payment method

drawer.description: Person or entity writing the check

payee.description: Person or entity whom the check is addressed to

bank.description: Bank performing the payment of the check

date.description: Date when the check was signed

code.description:
Code that identifies the voucher
x-amdocs-npi: voucherInfo:code

description.description: Description of the voucher. For example, "get one and receive one free"

value.description: Value of the voucher. For example, if it's a discount voucher, the value of the discount.

service.description: Organization, platform or currency backing the wallet (For example, PayPal, Yandex, BitCoin)

walletId.description: Unique identifier of the wallet in that service

walletUrl.description: URI pointing at the digital wallet

BankAccountDebit.description: Detailed information about the bank account

accountNumber.description: Bank account number (this could refer the IBAN or SWIFT Number)

accountNumberType.description: Type of the account (for example, IBAN,SWIFT)

bic.description: The business identifier code or Swift code of the financial institution where the account is located.

bank.description: The display name of the bank

QuantityType.description: Detailed information of value for Voucher

TokenizedCard.description: Detailed information about the tokenized card

brand.description: Card brand. Might be used for display purposes

type.description: Card type. Might be used for display purposes

lastFourDigits.description: Last four digits of the credit card. Might be used for display purposes

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the tokenized card

CashType.description: Detailed information of cash type payment method

PaymentMethod.description: Represents an instantiated payment method that can be of different types.

id.description: Unique id of a payment method.

href.description: Hypertext reference to the payment method

createdOn.description: Date and time when the entity was created.

lastModifiedOn.description: Date and time when the entity was last modified.

type.description: Type of payment method (for example, CreditCard, BankAccount, Cash, so on).

name.description: Name assigned to the payment method

description.description: Describes the contents of the payment method

preferred.description: Indicates whether or not the payment method is the preferred by the owner.

authorizationCode.description: Authorization code provided by a financial institution. Typically this would be populated for recurring payments using the payment method, as payments have an authorization code of their own.

status.description: Current status of the payment method.

details.description: Details of payment method. For example, bank account number, bank name, so on.

RelatedPartyRef.description: Party or party role that is linked to a specific entity

href.description: Hypertext reference to the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference

role.description: Role played by the related party

Customer.description:
Customer represents a person or organization that buys products and services from the enterprise or receives free offers or services. 
Customers can also be other service providers who resell the enterprises products, other service providers that lease the enterprise's resources for utilization by the other 
service provider's products and services, and so forth. Customer resource contains information about the customer. 
Main attributes are its identifier, name, status and validity, description, characteristics, contact medium, related customer account, related party, customer credit profile information.

customerType.description: The type of the customer such as Residential/Corporate etc.

customerSubType.description: The sub-type of customer such as Individual/Small Partnership etc.

acquisitionDate.description: The date of aquisition of the customer

createdOn.description: Date and time when the entity was created.

lastModifiedOn.description: Date and time when the entity was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier of Individual

href.description: Hypertext reference to the individual.

@schemaLocation.description: uri where the data model can be retrieved

createdOn.description: Date and time when the entity was created

lastModifiedOn.description: Date and time when the entity was last updated

formattedName.description: A formatted name useful for specific contexts for example Chinese,Japanese,Korean

fullName.description: Full Name flatten (first,middle and last name flatten)

location.description: Temporary current location of the individual (may be used if the individual has approved its sharing)

maritalStatus.description: Marital status of the individual ( Married,divorced etc.)

placeOfBirth.description: Place of the birth of the individual

status.description: Status of the individual (for example active/inactive/obsolete and so on)

residencyType.description: Type of residency such as rent,own

title.description: Used for title like Pr,Dr,Sir etc.

personRank.description: Degree of importance of the person to the service provider.

profileImageURL.description: Published url for profile picture of Individual

identification.description: Represents our registration of information used as proof of identity by an individual (Passport/national identity card/SSN etc.)

characteristic.description:
Describes the characteristics of individual such as individual hobbies,center of interest etc. Apart from storage and retrieval no operations such as filtering,sorting etc. will be supported.
No sensitive infomration should be stored in this attribute.

otherName.description: To keep track of other names for e.g old name of a woman before marriage , an artist name and so on

externalReference.description: To manage touch points external OTT identifiers for person (facebook,google+ etc.)

InfluenceScore.description: Social influence score of an individual
